name: The Wolf Within the Swamp
description: Good day! As you remember, the conflict here was rather serious and there is some heavy machinery left on the Shoreline. A little bird told me that Mechanic is trying to screw me by stealing those goods. We have a business here, and I have my own interest in disrupting his operations, you know. Place signal jammers on the speficied places on Shoreline.
success_message: Your promptness is amazing, great job! Here's your reward.

missions.message: Place the Signal Jammer on the first T-90 tank on Shoreline.
Place the Signal Jammer on the second T-90 tank on Shoreline.
Place the Signal Jammer on the third T-90 tank on Shoreline.
Place the Signal Jammer on the first UN Truck on Shoreline.
Place the Signal Jammer on the second UN Truck on Shoreline.
Place the Signal Jammer on the Helicopter on Shoreline.
